suggest.spryker-shop/shop-application: Use this module when using plugins that need Twig dependencies.
suggest.spryker/router: If you want to use RouteProviderPlugins to be added to the Route Module.
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
suggest.spryker/twig: Use this module when using plugins that need Twig dependencies.
